name: Continuum (gholaday)
description:
Controls/How to Play:

- WASD for movement

- SPACEBAR for slow mo

- TAB to shoot rockets

- Don't get hit and don't let your slow mo bar reach zero!

Joystick Controls:

- Left trigger for slow mo

- (A) to shoot rockets

Some Basic Tips:

- The lower your slow mo bar, the higher your overall multiplier will go. Use this to your advantage.

- While it may not seem obvious at first, fire rate powerups do increase the power of the laser beam weapon.

- You will get a extra life for every 999,999 points. This number doubles every time you get an extra life
